snippet.title: Pipistrello and the Cursed Yoyo - Official Spanish Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description: Get another look at gameplay, characters, and more in this trailer for Pipistrello and the Cursed Yoyo, a 2D top-down adventure game coming to PC (Steam and Epic Games Store) in 2024. Tighten up that string, and bust out the yoyo moves! Explore a sprawling urban landscape, reinterpreting your surroundings through your mastery of yoyo tricks. Solve puzzles, fight the city's rival crime lords, and regain the influence of the Pipistrello family!
